QuestData.Title: The Mogu Menace
QuestData.Description: Our scouts have discovered a heavy mogu force at Shan'ze Dao to the northwest.$B$BThe island was supposedly uninhabited, so their presence is disturbing news.$B$BEven more disturbing is the fact that they are performing sinister experiments on the island.$B$BI need a capable $c to check out the situation.$B$BThe Shan'ze are likely to give you trouble, and if they do, kill them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Shan'ze Serpentbinders or Shan'ze Beastmasters.
